code: import React from'react';import'./ToduList.css';import successicon from'../assets/successicon.png';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{deleteTodo,completedTodo}from'../redux/todoSlice';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ToduList(){const select=useSelector(state=>state.todo);const dispatch=useDispatch();function isCompleted(item){return item.completed===true?"#28a745":"transparent";}const deleteT=id=>{dispatch(deleteTodo(id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ToduList",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{children:select===null||select===void 0?void 0:select.map(item=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tableCondainer",style:{backgroundColor:isCompleted(item)},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{width:"10%"},children:item.completed?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:successicon,alt:"success",style:{width:'20px'}}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",id:item.id,name:item.todo,Checked:item.completed,onChange:()=>{dispatch(completedTodo(item.id));}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{width:"90%"},children:item.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Deletebtn",onClick:()=>deleteT(item.id),children:"Delete"})})]})},item.id);})})});}export default ToduList;
